The [93mstructure[0m of [93m2[0m [93mdiffers[0m from the [93mfew[0m [93mpreviously[0m [93mreported[0m [93mN[0m [93m2[0m [93m3[0m- [93mcomplexes[0m as it [93mpresents[0m [93mtwo[0m [93mTm[0m and [93mthree[0m [93mK[0m [93mcations[0m [93mbinding[0m the [93mN[0m [93m2[0m [93m3[0m- [93mradical[0m, [93mfacilitating[0m [93mN[0m [93m2[0m [93mfunctionalization[0m. [93mNotably[0m, the [93mK[0m [93m3[0m [93mTm[0m [93m2[0m -[93mbound[0m [93mN[0m [93m2[0m [93m3[0m- [93mmoiety[0m [93mreacts[0m with [93mexcess[0m [93mH[0m + to [93mform[0m [93mNH[0m [93m4[0m [93mCl[0m in [93m18[0m % [93myield[0m, and with [93mMeOTf[0m at [93mroom[0m [93mtemperature[0m to [93myield[0m the [93mdimethyl[0m [93mhydrazido[0m [93mcomplex[0m [[93mK[0m [93m2[0m {[93mTm[0m([93mOSi[0m([93mO[0m [93mt[0m [93mBu[0m) [93m3[0m ) [93m3[0m } [93m2[0m ([93mμ[0m-([93mCH[0m [93m3[0m )[93mNN[0m([93mCH[0m [93m3[0m ))] ([93m3[0m). [93mProtonolysis[0m of [93m3[0m [93myields[0m [93mMeHN[0m-[93mNMeH[0m ⋅ [93m2HCl[0m in [93m18[0m % [93myield[0m.

- The [93mchromatin[0m [93mremodeler[0m [93mSMARCA5[0m [93mbinds[0m to [93md[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mmetal[0m [93msupports[0m: [93mCharacterization[0m of [93maffinities[0m by [93mIMAC[0m [93mchromatography[0m and [93mQM[0m [93manalysis[0m.: The [93mISWI[0m [93mfamily[0m [93mprotein[0m [93mSMARCA5[0m [93mcontains[0m the [93mATP[0m-[93mbinding[0m [93mpocket[0m that [93mcoordinates[0m the [93mcatalytic[0m [93mMg2[0m+ [93mion[0m and [93mwater[0m [93mmolecules[0m for [93mATP[0m [93mhydrolysis[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m that [93mSMARCA5[0m [93mcan[0m [93malso[0m [93mpossess[0m an [93malternative[0m [93mmetal[0m-[93mbinding[0m [93mability[0m. [93mFirst[0m, [93mwe[0m [93misolated[0m [93mSMARCA5[0m on the [93mcobalt[0m [93mcolumn[0m ([93mIMAC[0m) to [93mnear[0m [93mhomogeneity[0m. [93mExamination[0m of the [93minteractions[0m of [93mSMARCA5[0m with [93mmetal[0m-[93mchelating[0m [93msupports[0m [93mshowed[0m that, [93mapart[0m from [93mCo2[0m+, it [93mbinds[0m to [93mCu2[0m+, [93mZn2[0m+ and [93mNi2[0m+. The [93mefficiency[0m of the [93mbinding[0m to the [93mlast[0m-[93mlisted[0m [93mmetal[0m was [93minfluenced[0m by the [93mchelating[0m [93mligand[0m, [93mresulting[0m in a [93mstrong[0m [93mpreference[0m for [93mNi[0m-[93mNTA[0m over the [93mNi[0m-[93mCM[0m-[93mAsp[0m [93mequivalent[0m. To [93mgain[0m [93minsight[0m in the [93mpreferential[0m [93maffinity[0m for the [93mNi[0m-[93mNTA[0m [93mligand[0m, [93mQM[0m [93mcalculations[0m were [93mperformed[0m on [92mmodel[0m [92msystems[0m and [93mmetal[0m-[93mligand[0m [93mcomplexes[0m with a [93mlimited[0m [93mprotein[0m [93mfragment[0m of [93mSMARCA5[0m [93mcontaining[0m the [93mdouble[0m-[93mhistidine[0m ([93mdHis[0m) [93mmotif[0m. The [93mcalculations[0m [93mcorrelated[0m the [93mobserved[0m [93maffinity[0m with the [93mrelative[0m [93mstability[0m of the [93md[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mmetals[0m to [93mtetradentate[0m [93mligand[0m [93mcoordination[0m over [93mtridentate[0m, as [93mwell[0m as [93mtheir[0m [93moverall[0m [93moctahedral[0m [93mcoordination[0m [93mcapacity[0m. [93mLikewise[0m, [93mbinding[0m [93mfree[0m [93menergies[0m [93mderived[0m from [92mmodel[0m [93mimidazole[0m [93mcomplexes[0m [93mmirrored[0m the [93mobserved[0m [93mNi[0m-[93mNTA[0m/[93mNi[0m-[93mCM[0m-[93mAsp[0m [93mpreferential[0m [93maffinity[0m. [93mFinally[0m, [93msimilar[0m [93mcalculations[0m on [93mcomplexes[0m with a [93mSMARCA5[0m [93mpeptide[0m [93mfragment[0m [93mderived[0m from the [93mAlphaFold[0m [93mstructural[0m [93mprediction[0m, [93mcaptured[0m [93malmost[0m [93maccurately[0m the [93mexpected[0m [93mrelative[0m [93mstability[0m of the [93mTM[0m [93mcomplexes[0m, and [93mproduced[0m a [93mlarge[0m [93menergetic[0m [93mseparation[0m (~[93m10[0m [93mkcal[0m∙[93mmol[0m-[93m1[0m) between [93mNi[0m-[93mNTA[0m and [93mNi[0m-[93mCM[0m-[93mAsp[0m in [93mfavour[0m of the [93mformer[0m.
